str2: Perhaps from the same as oros; the sky; by extension, heaven; by implication, happiness, power, eternity; specially, the Gospel.
Contracted from a primary word; soil; by extension a region, or the solid part or the whole of the terrene globe.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From para and erchomai; to come near or aside, i.e. To approach, go by, perish or neglect, avert.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
From lego; something said; by implication, a topic, also reasoning or motive; by extension, a computation; specially, the Divine Expression.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From para and erchomai; to come near or aside, i.e. To approach, go by, perish or neglect, avert.
